data.message: Hi Facebook.  The help center has no help for me on this...perhaps you can assist me.  Months ago I stopped getting any notification in my email for the posts that I have responded to, or posts I make, or anything.  I have already cleared my cache, checked my spam folder, checked my blocked list at my email account, and no luck.  I have posted this in help 4 times over the last 3 months, with no response....well, there might have been a response, but how could I tell,  since I don't get notifications.  I am almost to the point of just  giving up and deactivating my facebook account, as it is so very frustrating to me.  Any ideas?

replies.message: Hi Lori. If you've already tried all of our trouble shooting tips (https://www.facebook.com/help/202744123101612) and haven't had any luck, please let us know here: https://www.facebook.com/help/contact/156923807754889 Hope this helps! -Hailey

I have "let you know here" about 5-6 times since August, with absolutely no response. Thankfully I kept the post that I made on my page with the link to this page right at the top by not posting,  so that I could find this one again, otherwise I wouldn't have known you responded.
I have tried everything you have suggested.  No luck.  Any other suggestions?
